statements: SELECT * FROM student_interactions;
SELECT student_id, interaction_date, platform_name FROM student_interactions WHERE duration_minutes > 30;
SELECT student_id, interaction_date, platform_name, duration_minutes FROM student_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'Video Call';
SELECT student_id, interaction_date, interaction_type FROM student_interactions WHERE platform_name = 'Zoom' ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT MAX(duration_minutes) AS longest_interaction FROM student_interactions;
SELECT * FROM student_interactions WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT platform_name, interaction_date FROM student_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'Quiz' ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT AVG(duration_minutes) AS average_duration FROM student_interactions WHERE platform_name = 'Canvas';
SELECT student_id, COUNT(*) AS interaction_count FROM student_interactions GROUP BY student_id HAVING interaction_count > 2;
SELECT * FROM student_interactions WHERE interaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31' ORDER BY duration_minutes DESC;
SELECT student_name, email FROM Students;
SELECT * FROM Students WHERE enrollment_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT student_name, email FROM Students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Interactions ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT student_name, interaction_type FROM Students JOIN Interactions ON Students.student_id = Interactions.student_id;
SELECT student_name, email FROM Students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Students WHERE enrollment_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT student_name, interaction_type, interaction_date FROM Students JOIN Interactions ON Students.student_id = Interactions.student_id;
SELECT student_name, interaction_date, interaction_duration FROM Students JOIN Interactions ON Students.student_id = Interactions.student_id WHERE interaction_duration > 30;
SELECT student_name, interaction_type, interaction_duration FROM Students JOIN Interactions ON Students.student_id = Interactions.student_id ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM student_interactions;
SELECT student_id, interaction_type, interaction_time FROM student_interactions WHERE platform_id = 1;
SELECT platform_id, platform_name, platform_type FROM learning_platforms WHERE platform_type = 'online';
SELECT student_id, platform_id, unique_interactions FROM analytics_data ORDER BY unique_interactions DESC;
SELECT AVG(interaction_duration), MAX(interaction_duration), MIN(interaction_duration) FROM student_interactions;
SELECT * FROM student_interactions WHERE student_id = 101;
SELECT platform_name, platform_type FROM learning_platforms WHERE platform_category = 'Education';
SELECT student_id, COUNT(*) AS total_interactions FROM analytics_data GROUP BY student_id;
SELECT platform_name, COUNT(*) AS total_platforms FROM learning_platforms GROUP BY platform_type;
SELECT * FROM student_interactions ORDER BY interaction_time DESC, interaction_duration ASC;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, email FROM students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT course_name, instructor FROM courses ORDER BY course_name DESC;
SELECT student_id, course_id, interaction_type FROM interactions WHERE interaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT AVG(quiz_score) AS average_score, MAX(time_spent_seconds) AS max_time_spent FROM analytics WHERE analytics_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, email FROM students WHERE enrollment_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT course_name, start_date, end_date FROM courses WHERE instructor = 'John Smith';
SELECT student_id, course_id, interaction_type, interaction_date FROM interactions ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;

SELECT student_name, time_spent_seconds, quiz_score FROM students JOIN interactions ON students.student_id = interactions.student_id JOIN analytics ON interactions.interaction_id = analytics.interaction_id WHERE quiz_score > 80;
SELECT student_name, email_address FROM students
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM courses
SELECT interaction_type, interaction_date FROM interactions
SELECT assessment_type, assessment_date FROM assessments
SELECT grade_value, grade_date FROM grades
SELECT student_name, email_address FROM students
SELECT * FROM interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'attendance'
SELECT student_name, course_name, assessment_type FROM students JOIN assessments ON students.student_id = assessments.student_id JOIN courses ON assessments.course_id = courses.course_id
SELECT student_name, course_name, grade_value FROM students JOIN grades ON students.student_id = grades.student_id JOIN courses ON grades.course_id = courses.course_id WHERE grade_value >= 90
SELECT student_name, course_name, grade_value FROM students JOIN grades ON students.student_id = grades.student_id JOIN courses ON grades.course_id = courses.course_id ORDER BY grade_value DESC
